column4: hey can anyone help explain something to me? There's a script on one of our company servers that I want to edit, but I don't recall where the script is. It's obviously in one of the $PATH folders since I can just tab-complete it from any folder if I want to run it, but is there any kind of readlink-like command to find it or do I just have to use the find command?
awesome, that's 100% exactly what I was hoping for. Many many thanks!
